resources.string: Open now playing or resume last played song in Music Player.
Selected song/track will be played here. Track control options will be implemented to provide user friendly experience.
Songs should be played even the app is minimized.
Background Service or thread will be used to play the song and a notification with control options will be displayed for convenience.
All the Songs/Audios/Tracks are displayed here. You can select any song to play.
Songs are categorised based on Albums. You can select an Album to view the list of tracks which can be listened.
Songs are categorised based on Artists. You can select an Artist to view the list of tracks which can be listened.
Songs are categorised in Play Lists. You can create new Play Lists and add your favourite songs.
Songs in a users device need to be scanned and grouped in
Background threads or Services can be used to scan the songs/audio in the device storage which will not affect the performance of Main UI thread.
Song information need to be persisted in order to access whenever needed form
Content Providers can be used to save the Play List information.
All the recently played or added Songs/Audios/Tracks are displayed here. You can select any song to play.
Recently played Songs/Tracks information need to be persisted in order to access whenever needed form
Content Providers can be used to save the Recent Activity information.
Songs/Tracks will be listed here for the search query
All the settings and options will be displayed here in order to change the preferences.
Share functionality to share app information with others.
Send functionality to send app information through email, sms, etc.
